<!----------------------------------------------------------------------------->
<!-------------------- THIS MARKDOWN FILE IS AUTOGENERATED -------------------->
<!----------------------------------------------------------------------------->

A request for a block with the specified hash.

### Payload

|   Parameter  | Type  |              Description              |
|:------------:|-------|:-------------------------------------:|
| `block_hash` | bytes | The block hash of the requested block |
